Take <S%G142><s%> that <S%G4674>thine<s%> is, <S%G2532>and<s%> go thy way: <S%G5217><s%> <S%G1161>I<s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> unto <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G2078>last,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> unto thee. <S%G4671><s%>

Is it not lawful <S%G1832><s%> <S%G3756><s%> for <S%G3427>me<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> mine own? <S%G1699><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G4675>thine<s%> <S%G3788>eye<s%> <S%G4190>evil,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> good? <S%G18><s%>

They <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> We are <S%G1410>able.<s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> blind <S%G5185>men<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G3844>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> way <S%G3598>side,<s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> passed <S%G3855>by,<s%> cried <S%G2896>out,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Have <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on <S%G2248>us,<s%> O <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> thou <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G1138>David.<s%>
